author: Sarbani
title: Andaman trip in Jan 2016
text: Exotic Andamans with Neil Island Stay(deluxe) Package Inclusions Accommodation for 2 nights in Port Blair Accommodation for 2 nights in Havelock Accommodation for 1 night in Neil Meals: Daily Breakfast (except on the arrival day) and Dinner (except on the departure day) Roundtrip airfare for economy class with taxes Deluxe package includes all transfers and sightseeing by shared AC vehicle in Port Blair and a shared Non AC vehicle in Havelock and Neil. Entrance fees at all monuments as per itinerary; road taxes, parking fee, fuel charges, interstate taxes and portage at all hotels Snorkelling at Elephant Beach(Havelock) or Bharatpur Beach(Neil Island) once during the stay Services of a MMT Tour Manager in the destination. Package Itenerary Day 1: Arrival at Port Blair Board your flight from your respective hub and arrive in Port Blair. Make My Trip representative will meet you and transfer you to your hotel. In the evening, visit Corbyn's Cove Beach  a serene beach set in picturesque backgrounds of lush green coconut palms and pleasant sea. Later, witness the Light and Sound show at Cellular Jail the saga of countless martyrs of the Indian independence struggle who laid down their lives. The show, conducted in the premises of Cellular Jail, gives us a brief idea about the happenings in the jail prior to Independence. Return to the hotel in the evening. Enjoy your dinner and have a comfortable overnight stay at the hotel. Day 2: Port Blair - Havelock by ferry (30 Kilometers/1.5 Hours) After Breakfast, checkout from the hotel and proceed to visit Ross Island [closed on Wednesday]. Customers who miss the Ross Island visit due to closure, can also opt to visit the Cellular Jail. Later, board the ferry for onward journey to Havelock Island. Upon arrival, proceed for check-in at your hotel. Evening at leisure. Dinner and overnight stay at Havelock. Day 3: Havelock After breakfast at the hotel, proceed to Havelock jetty for excursion to Elephant Beach. Enjoy a free session of snorkeling at the beach. One may opt for other water sports available at the beach(on direct payment basis). Return to hotel in the afternoon. Post Lunch(on direct payment), proceed to visit one of the best beaches in Asia  Radhanagar Beach. Return back to your hotel, enjoy your dinner and have a comfortable overnight stay. Day 4: Havelock - Neil Island by ferry (1 Hour) After buffet breakfast, check out from the hotel. Transfer to the Havelock jetty to board the ferry for Neil Island. Disembark at Neil and transfer to the hotel. Post lunch(on direct payment), proceed to visit Bharatpur beach & Laxmanpur beach (depending on tide conditions). Return to the hotel in the evening. Enjoy your dinner and a comfortable overnight stay at the hotel. Day 5: Neil Island - Port Blair by ferry (1.5 Hours) Enjoy your breakfast at the hotel. Get transferred to the jetty for the ferry to Port Blair. Upon arrival in Port Blair, guests who have missed the visit to either Ross Island or Cellular Jail [if that was missed on the 2nd day of their itinerary & also if time permits] would visit the same. In the evening, proceed to Sagarekha emporium for shopping. Dinner & overnight stay at the specified Hotel. Day 6: Departure from Port Blair Post breakfast, check-out from the hotel & get transferred to the airport. Board the flight for your return journey. Tour ends with Memories Unlimited! Entrance fees at all monuments as per itinerary; road taxes, parking fee, fuel charges, interstate taxes and portage at all hotels Package Itenerary Day 1: Arrival at Port Blair Board your flight for Port Blair from your respective hubs. Welcome to Port Blair! You will be met upon arrival by a MakeMyTrip representative who will transfer you to your hotel. Upon arrival, proceed for check-in at your hotel. In the evening, visit Corbyn's Cove Beach  a serene beach set amidst lush green coconut palm trees. Later, witness the Light and Sound show at Cellular Jail  the saga of countless martyrs of the Indian independence struggle who laid down their lives. The show, conducted in the premises of Cellular Jail, gives us a brief idea about the happenings in the jail prior to Independence. Return to the hotel late in the evening. Enjoy dinner and a comfortable overnight stay at the hotel in Port Blair. Day 2: Port Blair - Havelock By: Ferry (30 kms/1.5 hrs) After breakfast, check out from the hotel and visit Ross Island (closed on Wednesday). Customers who miss the visit to Ross Island on this day can visit one of the most famous landmarks - Cellular Jail. Later, board the ferry for the journey to Havelock Island. Upon arrival, proceed for check-in at your hotel. Enjoy dinner and overnight stay at the hotel. Day 3: Havelock After breakfast at the hotel, head to Elephant Beach and enjoy a session of snorkelling. Return to the hotel in the afternoon. Post lunch (on direct payment basis), visit one of the best beaches in Asia  Radhanagar Beach. After a long and exciting day out in Havelock, enjoy dinner and a comfortable overnight stay at the hotel. Day 4: Havelock - Neil Island - Port Blair by Ferry (1 Hr + 1.5 Hr) After buffet breakfast, check out from the hotel. Transfer to the jetty to board the ferry for Neil Island. Disembark at Neil and visit Bharatpur Beach or Laxmanpur Beach (Depending on tide conditions). Post the excursion to the beach, proceed for a complimentary lunch. Afterward, embark on the ferry for Port Blair. Enjoy dinner and a comfortable overnight stay at the hotel. Day 5: Port Blair On this day, guests who have missed the visit to either Ross Island or Cellular Jail [if that was missed on the 2nd day of their itinerary] would proceed for the visit. In the evening, visit the Sagarekha emporium for shopping. Enjoy dinner and a comfortable overnight stay at the hotel. Day 6: Departure from Port Blair Check-out of the hotel and transfer to the airport. Board the flight for return journey. Hope you had a fabulous trip!
